Why You Should Choose Kenz

Kenz is being developed to connect you with verified tasks through planned partnerships with leading offerwall and survey networks. Our professional platform will ensure legitimate opportunities and secure payments.

Flexible Timer

Set your daily work time and pause/resume whenever you need. Work on your own schedule.

Simple Tasks

Complete easy tasks that fit your skills and interests. No complicated requirements.

Test Earning Model (Beta)

Help us test our earning system during beta phase. Full earning features available upon official launch.

Secure Platform

Your data and earnings are protected. Working towards partnerships with leading offer wall networks.

Task Examples

Discover the variety of legitimate tasks that will be available on Kenz. All tasks will be verified and sourced through planned partnerships with leading offerwall and survey networks.

App Testing

Test & review mobile apps during beta phases. Typical payout: $0.50–$2.00. Verification: Server-to-server postback & device fingerprint tracking.

Surveys & Forms

Complete market research surveys & opinion polls. Typical payout: $0.25–$5.00. Verification: Quality control checks & completion callbacks.

Account Registration

Sign up for websites, platforms, and services. Verify email addresses and complete profile setup. Projected earnings upon launch: $0.30 - $1.50 per task.

Micro Tasks

Simple data entry & content verification tasks. Typical payout: $0.10–$1.00. Verification: Manual review & automated quality checks.

Video & Content

Watch promotional videos & review content. Typical payout: $0.05–$0.75. Verification: View duration tracking & engagement metrics.

Trial Offers

Sign up for free trials & test services. Typical payout: $1.00–$10.00. Verification: Email confirmation & trial activation tracking.

How Kenz Works

Testing with Kenz is simple:

  • Set your daily work time in the app
  • Browse available tasks that match your skills
  • Complete tasks while your timer runs
  • Pause and resume your timer whenever needed
  • Get paid for completed tasks
